summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Lesley regarding a meeting request from Jeffrey Epstein to discuss account management with the Deutsche Bank team. It highlights the coordination needed for Epstein's return to New York City and the management of his accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to manage his accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team who will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is the recipient of the email and is being asked to confirm Epstein's availability for the meeting.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein regarding his account management.
Harry provided information to Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request.
Paul is part of the Deutsche Bank team that will manage Epstein's accounts.

events.title: Meeting Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team for account management upon his return to NYC.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
Jeffrey Epstein's meeting is scheduled for the week of October 8, 2013.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for the meeting.
Paul is part of the Deutsche Bank team managing Epstein's accounts.
The email emphasizes the need for confirmation of Epstein's availability.
